but free redshift</td>\n                </tr>\n                <tr>\n                  <td align=\"left\"> FZ2</td>\n                  <td align=\"center\">24</td>\n                  <td align=\"center\">38</td>\n                  <td align=\"center\">0.28</td>\n                  <td align=\"center\">11.9</td>\n                  <td align=\"left\"> fixed cosmology, all families but free redshift</td>\n                </tr>\n                <tr>\n                  <td align=\"left\"> WZ1</td>\n                  <td align=\"center\">7</td>\n                  <td align=\"center\">20</td>\n                  <td align=\"center\">0.25</td>\n                  <td align=\"center\">4.9</td>\n                  <td align=\"left\"> free <span class=\"simple-math\">&#937;<sub>m</sub></span> and <span class=\"simple-math\"><i>w</i></span> in a flat Universe, only spec families but free redshift</td>\n                </tr>\n                <tr>\n                  <td align=\"left\"> WZ2</td>\n                  <td align=\"center\">22</td>\n                  <td align=\"center\">38</td>\n                  <td align=\"center\">0.28</td>\n                  <td align=\"center\">11.9</td>\n                  <td align=\"left\"> free <span class=\"simple-math\">&#937;<sub>m</sub></span> and <span class=\"simple-math\"><i>w</i></span> in a flat Universe, all families but free redshift</td>\n                </tr>\n                <tr>\n                  <td align=\"left\"> NW1</td>\n                  <td align=\"center\">14</td>\n                  <td align=\"center\">20</td>\n                  <td align=\"center\">0.63</td>\n                  <td align=\"center\">32.0</td>\n                  <td align=\"left\"> free <span class=\"simple-math\">&#937;<sub>m</sub></span> and <span class=\"simple-math\"><i>w</i></span> in a flat Universe, only spec families and NFW instead of PIEMD</td>\n                </tr>\n                <tr>\n                  <td align=\"left\"> NW2</td>\n                  <td align=\"center\">29</td>\n                  <td align=\"center\">38</td>\n                  <td align=\"center\">0.62</td>\n                  <td align=\"center\">57.9</td>\n                  <td align=\"left\"> free <span class=\"simple-math\">&#937;<sub>m</sub></span> and <span class=\"simple-math\"><i>w</i></span> in a flat Universe, all families and NFW instead of PIEMD</td>\n                </tr>\n                <tr>\n                  <td align=\"left\"> Wa1</td>\n                  <td align=\"center\">13</td>\n                  <td align=\"center\">20</td>\n                  <td align=\"center\">0.29</td>\n                  <td align=\"center\">6.6</td>\n                  <td align=\"left\"> free <span class=\"simple-math\">&#937;<sub>m</sub></span>, <span class=\"simple-math\"><i>w</i></span> and <span class=\"simple-math\"><i>w</i><sub><i>a</i></sub></span> in a flat Universe, only spec families</td>\n                </tr>\n                <tr>\n                  <td align=\"left\"> Wa2</td>\n                  <td align=\"center\">28</td>\n                  <td align=\"center\">38</td>\n                  <td align=\"center\">0.29</td>\n                  <td align=\"center\">12.7</td>\n                  <td align=\"left\"> free <span class=\"simple-math\">&#937;<sub>m</sub></span>, <span class=\"simple-math\"><i>w</i></span> and <span class=\"simple-math\"><i>w</i><sub><i>a</i></sub></span> in a flat Universe, all families</td>\n                </tr>\n              </table></div><div class=\"history\">\n                <p><b>Notes.</b> Summary of the considered strong lensing models and their global results. Columns show the model IDs, the number of degrees of freedom (<span class=\"simple-math\"><i>d</i><i>.</i><i>of</i></span>), the number of input images used, the best fit positional <span class=\"simple-math\">&#916;<sub>rms</sub></span> (see Eq. (<a href=\"/articles/aa/full_html/2016/03/aa27670-15/aa27670-15.html#FD5\">5</a>)), the value of the reference <span class=\"img-inline\"><img src=\"/articles/aa/full_html/2016/03/aa27670-15/aa27670-15-eq314.png\" width=\"24\" height=\"18\" /></span> (computed considering an image positional error of <span class=\"img-inline\"><img src=\"/articles/aa/full_html/2016/03/aa27670-15/aa27670-15-eq60.png\" width=\"20\" height=\"12\" /></span>, see Eq. (<a href=\"/articles/aa/full_html/2016/03/aa27670-15/aa27670-15.html#FD4\">4</a>)) and a short description of each model.</p>\n              </div></div>\n  \n\r\n</div>\r\n\r\n    <div id=\"metrics-tabs\" data-doi=\"10.1051/0004-6361/201527670\" data-edps_ref=\"aa27670-15\">\n<nav class=\"toolbar\">\n\t<button class=\"toolbar-item\" id=\"metrics-siq\">Current usage metrics</button>\n\t<button class=\"toolbar-item\" id=\"info\">About article metrics</button>\n    \n\t\n\t<button class=\"toolbar-item\" id=\"return\">Return to article</button>\n</nav>\n\n<div class=\"panel\" data-for=\"metrics-siq\">\n</div>\n\n<div class=\"panel\" data-for=\"metrics-alm\"></div>\n\n<div class=\"panel\" data-for=\"info\">\n\t\n\n\t<p>Current usage metrics show cumulative count of Article Views (full-text article views including HTML views, PDF and ePub downloads, according to the available data)  and Abstracts Views on Vision4Press platform.</p>\n\n\t<p>Data correspond to usage on the plateform after 2015. The current usage metrics is available 48-96 hours after online publication and is updated daily on week days.</p>\n\n\t<div class=\"msg msg-info\">\n\t\t<span class=\"ico
